module: Module-level comment: This 'enc' module implements a top-level encryption system. It integrates various components including clock generation, wishbone bus arbitration, boot memory, coprocessor, UART, time-division multiplexing I/O, testing, timing, interrupt control, and an Amber core processor. The module manages data flow and control signals between these components using Wishbone interfaces and internal wires, enabling complex encryption operations and system management.
